output_list.reason: The distributeFUD function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to set the balances of recipients to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The transfer function does not check for overflow, allowing users to set their balances to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The transferFrom function does not check for overflow, allowing users to set the balances of recipients to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The approve function allows the owner to set the allowance to zero and then increase it without resetting the allowance to zero in between, allowing the owner to approve an increased allowance.
The constructor is misspelled as 'Constrctor', allowing anyone to become the owner of the contract.
